translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達、魔物討伐隊を置いてけぼりにしてこの城だけ魔物界の奥に向かっても意味は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others, there’s no point in heading deep into the monster world with only this castle, leaving the monster hunting squad behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、結局トッポスは、しばらく動かなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, in the end, Toppos didn’t move for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がーー、こんな事なら、どこか作戦に向かっていたらよかったわー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh—if that’s the case, I wish we had headed to some operation somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oda Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋を魔軍に抑えられているので、暇です・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Tenman Bridge is held by the demon army, it’s boring...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暇だ・・・ああ、だるい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's boring... ah, so tedious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはじっとランスの側にする・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel quietly stays by Rance’s side...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隣の部屋で３Ｇあたりがイライラしている、あやつは何をのんびり・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around 3G is getting irritated in the next room. What is that guy so relaxed about...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫、兄様は何か考えがあっての事です、私達は信じて待ちましょうとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Koki, brother has some plan in mind, we should trust and wait, or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食券行列と同じ、何度も勲章を貰えるイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like the ticket queue event, an event where you can repeatedly earn medals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は偉い、大総統だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am great, the Supreme Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸にじゃらじゃらと重くなるくらい勲章をわんさとつけたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to pile on so many medals that they jingle heavily on my chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えー、かっこわるいよーと誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh—someone says, 'That’s uncool!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拠点イベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Base Event

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖女モンスターが作った（命の卵）（大地の卵）（力の卵）（時の卵）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The holy maiden monster made (Egg of Life), (Egg of Earth), (Egg of Power), (Egg of Time).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このどれかを持っている時、４つ同時もあるし、１つの時もあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You may be holding one of these, sometimes all four at once, sometimes just one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城・・保育園
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle... Daycare

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なぜか卵が置かれていた、聖女モンスターが産んだものだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, eggs were placed there — they were laid by the holy maiden monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこに置くか悩んだが、台所や倉庫はなんだし・・という事でここになった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We struggled where to put them, but the kitchen and warehouse weren’t suitable... so it ended up here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動いている、孵化しそうよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s moving; it looks like it’s about to hatch!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命の卵の時は、ウェンリナーも居る状態で孵化を見守る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it’s the Egg of Life, Wenlina is also present to watch the hatching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新種のモンスターが産まれるーわくわく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new species of monster will be born — exciting!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱかっ、産まれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crack! It was born.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・これは？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is this??

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 締め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conclusion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この子、なんか世界観が違うような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This kid seems to have a different worldview or vibe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次世代の新種ね、ちょっと早すぎたかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a next-generation new species, maybe a bit too early.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should we do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに子供達には、危険だからモンスター部屋に移しましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it’s dangerous for the children, let’s move it to the monster room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption Event - since this is an addition, brief is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山に登りＫＤとまだ会ってない時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When climbing Mount Shoryu and not yet met KD.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山・・その頂上　１２０００メートル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mount Shoryu... its summit at 12,000 meters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界で一番高い場所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The highest place in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＫＤの独り言、だれもこないねーとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: KD's monologue, like 'No one is coming, huh.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい朝日だね、とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Nice sunrise,' or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう、今　下界では大戦争か、ま、私には関係ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, there’s a great war down below now? Well, it doesn’t concern me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か訪ねてこないかな、この黄金像でも見せてやるのにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if someone will come visit; I would even show them this golden statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And things like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption Event - since it's an addition, brief is sufficient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガの塔のイベントをまだ起こしてない時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the Horaga Tower event has not yet been triggered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シベリア・・その奥地、ホラガの塔・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siberia... in its depths, the Horaga Tower...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにひっそりと住むじいさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old man quietly living there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガとよーぜふの日常
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daily life of Horaga and Yosef.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーぜふが黄金像を持ち出す、こらこら、それをいじるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yosef takes out a golden statue. Hey, hey, don’t mess with that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは世界の最奥へ通じる・・いや、無駄な事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That leads to the world’s deepest reaches... No, it’s a useless endeavor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割り込みイベント　追加分なので短めで良いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption Event - since this is an addition, keeping it short is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地底のポピンズが始まってない時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the ‘Poppins of the Underground’ event has not yet started.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※また、この後、地底のポピンズを見ても違和感がないように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※Also, so that later viewing the ‘Poppins of the Underground’ event won’t feel out of place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが率いる人類軍が魔軍と戦っている時・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the human army led by Rance is fighting the demon army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その地下・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beneath them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズ達の王国があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was the kingdom of the Poppins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三菱王の様子、東芝王子をしかり、閉じ込めるシーンとかでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scenes showing King Mitsubishi’s demeanor, scolding Prince Toshiba, imprisoning him, might also be good.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
